Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot SX 50 HS
Reviews.Author: tmr
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the Canon Powershot.  My pictures are clear and crisp.  The "reach" and shutter speed work well for the shots I want.

Reviews.Title: Amateurs best friend
Reviews.Author: CCallahan
Reviews.Content: I love my new camera. The 50x zoom works great and the pictures are crystal clear. Being able to shoot a picture while using the video function is great. The rechargable battery is holding up well and i have yet to have it run out on me while i'm out. The only downside is the size. It is bulky and gets a bit heavy around the neck after an hour. Canon should have included a usb cord to download the pictures but the old ones from the canon cameras work. It has a separate HDMI port so i can run the videos on my tv.

ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX50 HS 12.1 MP Digital Camera with 50x Wide-Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom Deluxe Bundle With 8 GB Secure Digital High Capacity (SDHC) Memory Card, Digpro Compact Camera Deluxe Carrying Case
